Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.model.EntityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Entity>
public final class EntityManager
extends Object
implements Iterable<Entity>

A class which manages all of the entities within a world.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe
